main.name: Akhil's Space
main.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer
main.bio: Interested in Blockchain technology, open to talk about it.
main.contactmessage: Hey you can E-mail/WhatsApp/Telegram me and tell me ideas about how i should display my backend skills in a website like this. Also praise me/add comments below.

resume.skillmessage: These are the skills i know hands on but not limited to. Would love a hands on production level implementation of Docker(Microservices), Message queues(RabbitMQ, Kafka) etc.

education.school: International Institute of Information and Technology, Banglore
education.description: Learnt how to write smart contracts in Solidity, deploying them on top of a blockchain network, setting up a blockchain network(GETH) and tracking the transactions in Ganache (or) Metamask. Added in Github
education.description2: Learnt setting up a hyperledger network, with multiple MSPs and running them in a seperate container in a docker. Exposing the smart contract written in node.js for each container using express.js. Added in Github

education.degree: Bachelors Degree in Computer Science and Engineering GPA 8.5/10
education.description: Learnt basics of Computer Science and Technology like System design, SQL (DB). Participated in Hackerrank coding competitions and have 2 bronze medals

work.title: Software Development Engineer (Full Stack)
work.description: Working as a full stack developer for JioSign, a product used to sign documents using several signing methods. Project is live @ jiosign.jio.com. My tech stack includes development in React.js, Java spring boot. Tech stack here is amazing, currently learning, will update here as soon as i learn things

work.title: Associate Consultant (Full Stack)
work.description: Worked as a full stack developer to develop a product which is used in the clients place by over 100,000 users.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Travelled to Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, as a T&M resource for SIDF. Roles included Requirement gathering, checking the feasibility, implementing those in SAPUI5(UI), Java (REST API), SAP PI (Middleware), SAP ABAP(Backend)

work.title: SDE Intern
work.description: Worked as an Angular (UI), Java (REST API) and SQL Developer to develop applications for data entry in a non-profit organization (Cancer Institute).
